name: Manual of Psionic Prowess
description:
This supplement for Heroes of Adventures presents rules for using Psionics in your sessions! The book includes the following,

Two new heroes: The Manifester, potent users of the four Psionic Arts and the Martial Artists, disciplined students of psionic infused Styles. This supplement provides detailed rules on what makes Psionics different than magic and Manifestations found in each of the four schools of Psionics; Mind, Body, Soul and Grave.

An entry in the 2022 Heroes of Adventure TTRPG game jam hosted by Nameless Designer.
